type.name: COLUMN
type.sql: "select column_name, case when data_type = 'NUMBER' and data_scale = 0 and data_precision is not null then column_name || ' ' || data_type || '(' || data_precision || '),' when data_type = 'NUMBER' and data_scale = 0 and data_precision is null then column_name || ' ' || data_type || ',' when data_type = 'NUMBER' and data_scale > 0 then column_name || ' ' || data_type || '(' || data_precision || ',' || data_scale || '),' when data_type = 'NUMBER' and data_scale is null then column_name || ' ' || data_type || ',' when data_type = 'VARCHAR2' then column_name || ' ' || data_type || '(' || data_length || '),' when data_type = 'CHAR' then column_name || ' ' || data_type || '(' || data_length || '),' when data_type = 'FLOAT' then column_name || ' ' || data_type || '(' || data_precision || '),' else column_name || ' ' || data_type || ',' end from user_tab_cols where table_name = '%s' order by column_id;"%tabname
